title: Announcement, Morris Brose: A Sustained Vision, 1987
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, right center: Design: Edward Fella, Cranbrook
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black diagonally across upper left quadrant: ARTIST LECTURE: RECEPTION immediately FOLLOWING; across upper left quadrant: Saturday, May 16, 2pm, at the gallery; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; diagonally across lower half of sheet, from lower left quadrant to lower right corner: MORRIS BROSE:/ A SUSTAINED VISION/ APRIL 25 -- MAY 23 1987
Verso: Imprinted in black across left edge, running upward, sideways: MORRIS BROSE:/ A SUSTAINED VISION; running downward, sideways: (313) 962-9025; across upper right quadrant: 1987/ April 25 - May 23; diagonally across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY; across lower left quadrant: 743 Beaubien Detroit Michigan 48226/ With the support of the National Endowment for the Arts/ the Michigan Council for the Arts/ Detroit Council of the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Non-profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit  focus Gallery Exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout. 
Recto: Upper left quadrant, blurred image of man leaning over table.  Diagonally across center to lower right, spirals.  Right center, geometric shapes.  Lower left edge, text giving location, contact information.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving exhibition title, dates.  
Verso: Across upper half of sheet, two columns of geometric shapes.  Across left edge, center, text giving exhibition title. title at left.  Across upper right quadrant, text giving dates.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Morris Brose: A Sustained Vision, 1987. Offset lithograph on tan paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-31
